name: Jumpers
description:
Description

PLEASE NOTE DEVELOPMENT HAS BEEN CANCELED. WE ARE REDOING THE GAME TO GET UPDATES JOIN OUR DISCORD! https://discord.gg/PMTdz9S

Jumpers is a 3D object dodging game. Essentially you dodge cubes well moving forward until you hit a cube. Now you might be thinking it's already done; well you would be correct, but there are a lot of things that make us different. We include a level based, random generated (In Development), and multiplayer (In Development.)

Information

Jumpers development started to be made on 4/13/2017 and was worked on from (11:55-3:15) that day as a hobby. The first development version was released 4/14/2017 (7:00) (that was version 0.0.0.1)

Other

Versions are separated into several parts.

(Release Name).(Main Version Number).(Secondary Version Number).(Prerelease version number)

Release Names Are

1=Beta
